Source of data: https://www.kaggle.com/thefc17/bundesliga-results-19932018

```{r}
library(fivethirtyeight)

```


Div = Division
Date = The division the matches were played in. All are "D1", because this set contains results from only the top league, or division


```{r}

bundesliga_data <- read_csv(here::here("data", "Bundesliga_Results.csv"))

glimpse(bundesliga_data)
skim(bundesliga_data)
bundesliga_data

```


```{r}
bundesliga_data %>% 
  group_by(Div, Season, HomeTeam) %>% 
  count()
```
